substats: Speed tuning before DPS >> CRIT Rate = CRIT DMG > ATK%. Build Tank stats (HP%/DEF%) at Lower investments. Build Effect RES to 30% if running Broken Keel/

conesNew.notes: Highest personal DMG. Easy and consistent DMG Bonus when paired with an Imaginary DPS. Works well at high superimpositions.
Yukong cannot make use of the extra SP due to her Ultimate not targetting an ally. Energy recharge and DMG Buff for the next ally is still useful.
Can enable a 3-Turn Ult rotation through Ult > Skill > Basic > Skill, with Energy regen rope (Atleast S2 cone). Use this if you plan to Basic attack on Yukong a lot.
Can enable a 3-Turn Ult rotation through Ult > Skill > Basic > Skill, with Energy regen rope. Use this if you plan to Basic attack on Yukong a lot.
Good lightcone in general for advancing all allies forward, does not require high superimpositions.
12% ATK Buff for the whole team.
